SEARCH
Package org.bvsd

Class Pixel

java.lang.Object
org.bvsd.Pixel
public class Pixel extends Object
This class provides methods and data to represent an RGB/RGBA pixel where each channel is 8 bits, ranging from 0-255.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Pixel(int rgb)
    Constructs a pixel with specified red, green, and blue values based on the provided binary integer.
    Pixel(int r, int g, int b)
    Constructs a pixel with specified red, green, and blue values, defaulting alpha to 1.0.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getBlue()
    Gets the amount of blue in the pixel.
    int

    Gets the amount of green in the pixel.
    int
    getRed()
    Gets the amount of red in the pixel.
    int
    getRGB()
    Gets a composite RGB value.
    void
    setBlue(int b)
    Sets the amount of blue in the pixel.
    void
    setGreen(int g)
    Sets the amount of green in the pixel.
    void
    setRed(int r)
    Sets the amount of red in the pixel.
    void
    setRGB(int rgb)
    Sets the RGB values of the pixel using a single composite integer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pixel

      public Pixel(int r, int g, int b)
      Constructs a pixel with specified red, green, and blue values, defaulting alpha to 1.0.
      Parameters:
      r - The amount of red (0-255).
      g - The amount of green (0-255).
      b - The amount of blue (0-255).

    • Pixel

      public Pixel(int rgb)
      Constructs a pixel with specified red, green, and blue values based on the provided binary integer.
      Parameters:
      rgb - The binary integer representing RGB values.

      Gets a composite RGB value.
      Returns:

    • setRed

      public void setRed(int r)
      Sets the amount of red in the pixel. Clamps to range [0 ... 255].
      Parameters:
      r - The new red value (0-255).

    • setGreen

      public void setGreen(int g)
      Sets the amount of green in the pixel. Clamps to range [0 ... 255].
      Parameters:
      g - The new green value (0-255).

      Sets the amount of blue in the pixel. Clamps to range [0 ... 255].
      Parameters:
      b - The new blue value (0-255).

    • setRGB

      public void setRGB(int rgb)
      Sets the RGB values of the pixel using a single composite integer.
      Parameters:
      rgb - The composite RGB value
